name: FileMaker Pro 12 Database
summary: Learn about .FMP12 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: FileMaker Pro databases can be used for storing contacts, business inventory, project data, invoices, and other information. Databases may be shared with team members via the Web or by using iPhone and iPad devices with the FileMaker Go app installed.
NOTE: The FMP12 format is new with FileMaker Pro 12. FileMaker Pro 7-11 use the .FP7 extension.

description: An FMP12 file is a database file created with FileMaker Pro 12 database development program. It contains the overall database structure (also known as database schema) along with the data inside it. The structure of an FMP12 file is based on tables where each table consists of a number of database fields having different data types. Some data types that are supported by FMP12 file format include text, custom forms, reports, datetime, blobs, and other database objects. Older FileMaker Pro file formats such as FP7 can be upgraded to FMP12.

Database file created by FileMaker Pro 12, a personal and business database development program; stores the database structure (tables and fields) and the records that fill the tables; may also include custom forms, reports, and other database objects; can include a custom theme for personalizing the interface.

instructions: Older FileMaker Pro file formats such as 11, 10, 9, 8 and 7 (.fp7) databases to FMP12 file formats. FileMaker has extensive guidelines to convert earlier version of FileMaker Pro file formats to FMP12.
